import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import PostAuthor from '../components/PostAuthor'; const PostItem = ({postID,category,title,description,authorID,thumbnail}) => { const shortDescription = description.length > 145 ? description.substr(0,145) + '...' : description; const postTitle = title.lenght > 30 ? title.substr(0,30) + '...' : title; return (

{postTitle}

{shortDescription}

{category}
) } export default PostItem
